name: Day 1: Chest, Back, Shoulders, Legs, Biceps, Triceps
desc: Chest – Barbell Bench Press – 4 sets of 8 reps,Back – Lat-pulldowns – 4 sets of 10 reps,Shoulders – Seated Dumbbell Press – 4 sets of 10 reps,Legs – Leg Extensions – 4 sets of 10 reps,Biceps – Barbell Bbicep Curls – 3 sets of 10 reps,Triceps – Triceps Rope Pushdowns – 3 sets of 15 reps

name: Day 2: Legs, Triceps, Biceps, Chest, Back, Shoulder

name: Day 3: Shoulders, Back, Chest, Legs, Triceps, Biceps

name: Day 4:  Shoulders, chest, and Triceps
